Plot: A retiring police chief pledges to catch the killer of a young child.
Title: The Pledge
Writer: Friedrich Dürrenmatt (book), Jerzy Kromolowski (screenplay), Mary Olson-Kromolowski (screenplay)
Actors: Patricia Clarkson, Beau Daniels, Benicio Del Toro, Dale Dickey
tomatoConsensus: Though its subject matter is grim and may make viewers queasy, The Pledge features an excellent, subtle performance by Jack Nicholson.
